findings.title: Risk of excessive authority
findings.description: The owner role can arbitrarily modify the minter role address through the changeMinter function, leading to the risk of excessive owner authority.

findings.title: Unrecoverable issue of pool imbalance
findings.description: In the SmoothyV1 contract, when the user performs operations such as recharge, redemption, and exchange, the penalty mechanism will be triggered when the weight of the coin exceeds the soft cap, but the contract does not have an incentive mechanism to perform exchange operations to reduce the proportion of the token pool. If the token pool is maliciously manipulated to exceed the soft cap, it may be difficult for the token pool to return to normal due to no incentive mechanism, which will affect normal business use.
